short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Purpose PRO: AI for nonprofit & academic professionals. Create high-quality grant proposals, reports, donor content, and more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Connect your custom AI anywhere you work: Google Docs, emails, grantor websites, social media platforms! Create tailored professional content that follows your and your organization's writing style, voice, and tone, with minimal inputs and iterations needed.

Purpose PRO will help you free up and reclaim your valuable time spent on tedious and repetitive aspects of your job.

Focus on creating a better world with your nonprofit and research missions! We will help you realize your true purpose!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

➤ Who must use it?
~ Nonprofit Professionals
Purpose PRO helps nonprofit professionals create a broad range of nonprofit content (donor newsletters, social media content, reports, program and grant writing, and much more) efficiently and with minimal revisions.

~ Academic Professionals (Researchers)
Purpose PRO helps academic professionals focus on value-adding activities while streamlining research, paper writing, teaching materials, and grant writing.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

➤ How it works?
1. Install the Purpose PRO extension for Chrome
2. Sign in with Google and select the Assistant that best suits your writing goals
3. Activate Purpose PRO using hotkeys: Cmd+Option+P for Mac and Ctrl+Alt+P for Windows
4. Start creating and editing content on any website. Call Purpose PRO for quick actions over existing text (respond, shorten/lengthen, feedback) or create new text with custom instructions!

➤ Works from anywhere!
Purpose PRO is designed to work seamlessly in your Chrome browser. Use it in Google Docs, email clients, social media - anywhere across the web!

➤ How much it costs?
~ Free Trial
Start your 7 Day Free Trial of 30 AI Runs with any 5 Assistants of your choice

~ Paid Plans
Continue with flexible Monthly or Yearly Saver plans. More details on our website:www.purposetech.ai/pro

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

➤ Terms and Conditions
By installing the extension, you agree to and acknowledge our terms of service and privacy policy available at: 
- www.purposetech.ai/terms-of-service
- www.purposetech.ai/privacy-policy
